content: welcome to the freedc yarn bomb community started by washington-based activists postering messaging demonstrating and now using textile signage to let everyone in the capital know free double_crochet s message **the people of double_crochet are joyful and powerful and we deserve the right to govern ourselves ** the patterns are an artistic expression of craftivism created for our free double_crochet community & neighbors to yarn-bomb the district of columbia your unique artistic talents and creativity are welcome the patterns are just suggestions feel free to use our version or your own by knitting crocheting cross-stitching or any other fiber technique with lettering in any style you like intarsia fair-isle duplicate stitch embroidery etc we ve developed the free double_crochet colorwork pattern in 3 styles two vertical skinny & chunky and one horizontal **mail your finished creations to ** stitch double_crochet 996 maine ave sw #835 washington double_crochet 20024 *for more about free double_crochet visit freedcproject org*
